movies.title: Superman
movies.plot: Mild-mannered Clark Kent works as a reporter at the Daily Planet alongside his crush, Lois Lane. Clark must summon his superhero alter-ego when the nefarious Lex Luthor launches a plan to take over the world.
movies.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 17 wins & 19 nominations.
